Title: Christiane F.
Writer: Uli Edel (additional writer), Kai Hermann (book), Horst Rieck (book), Herman Weigel
Actors: Eberhard Auriga, Natja Brunckhorst, Peggy Bussieck, Lothar Chamski
Plot: This movie portrays the drug scene in Berlin in the 1970s, following tape recordings of Christiane F. 14-year-old Christiane lives with her mother and little sister in a typical multi-story...
